name: Natural Selectin
description: This is a complete rebuild of the game Natural Selection for Windows, Linux, and OS X. It includes updates and fixes by pierow, Prefix, fmoraw, Bacsu, puzl, and others.

files.archive: N/A:Please locate and select the ns_v322_full.zip file downloaded from here https://github.com/ENSL/NS/releases

content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Please locate and select the ns_v322_full.zip file downloaded from
    here https://github.com/ENSL/NS/releases
game:
  appid: 70
  args: -game ns
installer:
- execute:
    command: unzip $archive -d $GAMEDIR
requires: half-life-steam
requires-binaries: unzip
steam: {}
